mapper.insert: insert into evaluation(profile_name, user_id, content_id, star_rating, review, rating_date) values (#{dto.profileName}, #{userId}, #{dto.contentId}, #{dto.starRating}, #{dto.review}, #{dto.ratingDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM evaluation WHERE user_id = #{userId} and profile_name = #{profileName} and content_id=#{contentId}
mapper.select: select profile_name, content_id, star_rating, review, rating_date from evaluation where content_id=#{contentId} ORDER BY rating_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, 20
